com.sindice.result
Class CacheResultMapper

java.lang.Object
  com.sindice.result.CacheResultMapper

public class CacheResultMapper
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for mapping a JSON object to a given java object. The mapping is performed on the object's fields, the association is done using the CacheResultMapper.JSONMapping annotation.

Author:
Michele Mostarda (mostarda@fbk.eu)

Nested Class Summary
static interface CacheResultMapper.JSONMapping
          Provides a mapping of Java object instance fields to JSON object names.

mapTo

public static void mapTo(CacheResult cacheResult,
                         org.json.simple.JSONObject node)
Performs a mapping of the content of node JSON object on cacheResult.

Parameters:
cacheResult - the object to be populated.
node - the data source of the mapping.

mapToCacheResult

public static CacheResult mapToCacheResult(org.json.simple.JSONObject node)
Maps the given JSON object to a new instance of CacheResult.

Parameters:
node - JSON object to be mapped.
Returns:
a new instance of CacheResult with valorized fields.
